name: AddEventListener
description: Registers a function to be called when a specific event occurs in the game. This allows mods to respond to player actions and game events.

parameters.name: eventName
parameters.description: The name of the event to listen for (e.g., 'onPlayerJoin', 'onPlayerLeave')

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The function to call when the event occurs

returns.description: This function does not return a value

example:
-- Listen for player join events
AddEventListener("onPlayerJoin", function(player)
    print("Welcome " .. player.username .. "!")
    local entity = GetPlayerEntity(player)
    SetEntityCoords(entity, vec3(0, 10, 0))
end)

-- Listen for player leave events
AddEventListener("onPlayerLeave", function(player)
    print(player.username .. " has left the game")
end)
notes: Event callbacks receive relevant data as parameters
Multiple listeners can be registered for the same event
Events are triggered automatically by the game engine
